name: Off The Rails
summary:
Off the Rails is a tabletop game designed by Andrew Platt. Build tracks and race Minecarts under the Great Mountain to collect as many Jewels as you can before the ground underneath collapses into the Chasm, burying all the wealth forever!
Off the Rails is a strategic, competitive 2-8 player tabletop game with tile placement, risk / reward mechanics and tons of fun for everyone!
This app lets you score easily after the game is complete.
